abstract: It would seem to be a magazine’s dream: Take something you have already published and sold, repackage it and distribute it without paper or ink expenses.
snippet: It would seem to be a magazine’s dream: Take something you have already published and sold, repackage it and distribute it without paper or ink expenses.
lead_paragraph: It would seem to be a magazine’s dream in these straitened times: Take something you have already published and sold, repackage it and distribute it without all that expense of paper, ink and trucks, and then sell it again.

headline.main: Campaign Articles From Newsweek Become E-Books for Amazon Kindle
headline.print_headline: Campaign Articles From Newsweek Become E-Books for Amazon Kindle
